languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на Фолстоуне совершена невероятная находка! При реставрации склепа святого Кифы был найден утерянный том его дневников. Следуя записям подвижника, братья Ордена Молота смогли отыскать криптоковчег с техносвятыней святого Когнация — Горнилом. Писания Кифы о нем туманны, Горнило называется "ваятелем и преобразителем, несущим житие и благодать". Эксплораторы выслали делегацию и предъявили претензии на сокровище. Жаркий диспут идет уже много дней".

"An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Keefe's lost diary has been found during the restoration of his crypt. According to his records, the members of the Order of the Hammer were able to find the cryptoark containing a relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Keefe's writings on it are vague, it is called 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace.' The Explorators have sent a delegation, claiming the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на Фолстоуне совершена невероятная находка! При реставрации склепа святого Кифы был найден утерянный том его дневников. Следуя записям подвижника, братья Ордена Молота смогли отыскать криптоковчег с техносвятыней святого Когнация — Горнилом. Писания Кифы о нем туманны, Горнило называется "ваятелем и преобразителем, несущим житие и благодать". Эксплораторы выслали делегацию и предъявили претензии на сокровище. Жаркий диспут идет уже много дней".

traits.locale_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Cephas's lost diary has been found during the restoration of his crypt. According to his records, the members of the Order of the Hammer were able to find the cryptoark containing a relic of Saint Cognatius —The Crucible. Cephas's writings on it are vague, it is called the 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace'. The Explorators have sent a delegation and have made claims to the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days"

languages.text: “舰长大人，人们在荒寂岩地发现了不可思议的东西！在修缮圣赛法斯的墓地之间，人们发现了他遗失的日记。重锤修会的成员根据他的记录，找到了藏有圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗物的保险柜——‘熔炉’。赛法斯对它的描述很模糊，我们只知道它是‘雕刻家与变形者，会赐予生命与优雅’。开拓者舰队听说这个消息之后，立刻派来了代表团，声称这些宝藏属于他们。双方实力之间的激烈争论已经持续了许多天。
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Cephas's lost diary has been found during the restoration of his crypt. According to his records, the members of the Order of the Hammer were able to find the cryptoark containing a relic of Saint Cognatius —the Crucible. Cephas's writings on it are vague, it is called the 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace'. The Explorators have sent a delegation, claiming the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，人们在荒寂岩地发现了不可思议的东西！在修缮圣赛法斯的墓地之间，人们发现了他遗失的日记。重锤修会的成员根据他的记录，找到了藏有圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗物的保险柜——‘熔炉’。赛法斯对它的描述很模糊，我们只知道它是‘雕刻家与变形者，会赐予生命与优雅’。开拓者舰队听说这个消息之后，立刻派来了代表团，声称这些宝藏属于他们。双方实力之间的激烈争论已经持续了许多天。

languages.text: «¡Se ha hecho un hallazgo increíble en Rocainmunda, Lord Capitán! Un volumen perdido del diario perdido de San Cefas ha sido encontrado durante la restauración de su cripta. Según sus registros, los miembros de la Orden del Martillo pudieron encontrar la cripta que contenía una reliquia de San Cefas, el Crisol. Los escritos de Cefas sobre él son imprecisos, se le llama "el escultor y transformador, que concede vida y gracia". Los Exploradores han enviado una delegación, reclamando el tesoro. La acalorada disputa dura ya muchos días».
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Cephas's lost diary has been found during the restoration of his crypt. According to his records, the members of the Order of the Hammer were able to find the cryptoark containing a relic of Saint Cognatius —the Crucible. Cephas's writings on it are vague, it is called the 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace'. The Explorators have sent a delegation, claiming the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: «¡Se ha hecho un hallazgo increíble en Rocainmunda, Lord Capitán! Un volumen perdido del diario perdido de San Cefas ha sido encontrado durante la restauración de su cripta. Según sus registros, los miembros de la Orden del Martillo pudieron encontrar la cripta que contenía una reliquia de San Cefas, el Crisol. Los escritos de Cefas sobre él son imprecisos, se le llama «el escultor y transformador, que concede vida y gracia». Los Exploradores han enviado una delegación, reclamando el tesoro. La acalorada disputa dura ya muchos días».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンで信じられないような発見がありました！聖セファの行方不明になっていた日記が地下墓地の修復中に発見されたのです。その記録によれば、鉄槌の修道会のメンバーは、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物...坩堝が入ったクリプトアークを発見することができたそうですよ。セファの書いた内容は不明瞭で、 それを、'生命と恩寵を与える彫刻家と変容者 'と呼んでいます。エクスプロレイターは代表団を遣わして財宝を要求していて、激しい論争が何日も続いている状態です」
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Cephas's lost diary has been found during the restoration of his crypt. According to his records, the members of the Order of the Hammer were able to find the cryptoark containing a relic of Saint Cognatius —the Crucible. Cephas's writings on it are vague, it is called the 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace'. The Explorators have sent a delegation, claiming the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンで信じられないような発見がありました！聖セファの行方不明になっていた日記が地下墓地の修復中に発見されたのです。その記録によれば、鉄槌の修道会のメンバーは、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物...坩堝が入ったクリプトアークを発見することができたそうですよ。セファの書いた内容は不明瞭で、 それを、'生命と恩寵を与える彫刻家と変容者 'と呼んでいます。エクスプロレイターは代表団を遣わして財宝を要求していて、激しい論争が何日も続いている状態です」

languages.text: « On nous a signalé une découverte incroyable sur Rochepeste, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Un chapitre inconnu du journal perdu de Saint Céphas a été mis au jour lors de travaux de restauration de sa crypte. Le document nous a appris que les membres de l'Ordre du Marteau avaient réussi à retrouver la cryptoarche qui contenait une relique de Saint Cognatius : le Creuset. Céphas est avare de détails, mais il décrit tout de même ce dernier comme "le sculpteur et transformateur, source de vie comme de grâce". Les Explorators ont envoyé une délégation récupérer le trésor. Des échanges houleux durent depuis des jours. »
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Cephas's lost diary has been found during the restoration of his crypt. According to his records, the members of the Order of the Hammer were able to find the cryptoark containing a relic of Saint Cognatius —the Crucible. Cephas's writings on it are vague, it is called the 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace'. The Explorators have sent a delegation, claiming the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: « On nous a signalé une découverte incroyable sur Rochepeste, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Un chapitre inconnu du journal perdu de Saint Céphas a été mis au jour lors de travaux de restauration de sa crypte. Le document nous a appris que les membres de l'Ordre du Marteau avaient réussi à retrouver la cryptoarche qui contenait une relique de Saint Cognatius : le Creuset. Céphas est avare de détails, mais il décrit tout de même ce dernier comme "le sculpteur et transformateur, source de vie comme de grâce". Les Explorators ont envoyé une délégation récupérer le trésor. Des échanges houleux durent depuis des jours. »

languages.text: "Auf Foulstone wurde etwas Unglaubliches entdeckt, Lord Captain! Bei der Restauration seiner Gruft wurde ein Band des verschollenen Tagebuchs des Heiligen Cephas gefunden. Laut seinen Aufzeichnungen haben die Mitglieder des Ordens des Hammers die Kryptolade mit einer Reliquie des Heiligen Cognatius entdeckt — den Tiegel. Cephas Aufzeichnungen sind vage, er spricht nur vom 'Erschaffer und Verwandler, der Leben und Gnade gewährt'. Die Exploratoren haben eine Delegation geschickt, die den Schatz bergen soll. Der erbitterte Streit läuft schon seit vielen Jahren."
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Cephas's lost diary has been found during the restoration of his crypt. According to his records, the members of the Order of the Hammer were able to find the cryptoark containing a relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Cephas's writings on it are vague, it is called the 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace'. The Explorators have sent a delegation, claiming the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days."
